EmailTemplate.name: RE: MacTutor, Inc. Invoice - Secure-A-Lot - #10558 (1333580174.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MacTutor, Inc. Invoice - Secure-A-Lot - #10558 (1333580174.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Robert, It looks as though this is a limitation to our system. I have reported it and my proposed solution is for you to sign electronically as Robert Mackay and then I will send you an addendum stating that Robert Mackay will be replaced with Mactutor and we can both physically sign. Please let me know if this proposed solution is acceptable and I apologize for the inconvenience. Have a nice evening,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Robert Mackay [mailto:r.mackay@mactutor.net] Sent: Tuesday, April 03, 2012 6:28 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MacTutor, Inc. Invoice - Secure-A-Lot - #10558 Hi Sara, I am not the contractor. MacTutor, Inc is, I will not signing a contract between Robert MacKay and MBO, the agreement is between MBO and MacTutor Inc. I am signing on behalf of Mactutor, Inc., as its President. Our Address is:MacTutor Inc.1130 Cleveland St.Ste. 220Clearwater, FL 33755 Please let me know when its ready. PresidentMacTutor, Inc.r.mackay@mactutor.net <mailto:r.mackay@mactutor.net>FileMaker 11, 10, 9, 8 Certified DeveloperFileMaker 11, 10 Authorized Trainerph 727 230-1439fax 727 230-1942 The MacTutor Team “Even in These Tough Economic Times, FileMaker Tools Assist Your Expansion” See who our Clients are http://www.mactutor.net/filemaker/our_clients.html <http://www.mactutor.net/filemaker/our_clients.html>
Find out more about our Authorized Training Classes in Florida http://www.mactutor.net/filemaker/training.html <http://www.mactutor.net/filemaker/training.html>
Read some success stories http://www.mactutor.net/filemaker/training_testimonials.html <http://www.mactutor.net/filemaker/training_testimonials.html>
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s). It is covered by the Electronic Communications Privacy Act, 18 U.S.C. § 2510-2521 and is legally privileged. It may also contain information protected by the vender-client privilege. Unauthorized review, use, disclosure or distribution is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient and have received this communication in error, please contact the sender by reply e-mail and destroy and delete all copies of the original message. THANK YOU! On Apr 3, 2012, at 5:48 PM, Sara Conde wrote:Hi Robert, You are signing a corp to corp/ vender/contractor/1099 agreement, in terms of this arrangement, they all mean the same thing. MBO will be paying your company directly (via Bruce’s MBO account) and not withholding any taxes. The payment process works as follows; the client (City of Norwalk) pays MBO, these funds are deposited same day into Bruce’s MBO account. Once you sign the contract Mactutor have an account with MBO by which you will bill/invoice Bruce’s MBO account and he will pay you with funds from his MBO account. There is no fee associated with moving the money from Bruce’s MBO account to Mactutor’s business account. No funds will be paid until MBO receives payment from the City of Norwalk. I have corrected the business address in our system as well. Please let me know if you have any additional questions. Thank you,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Robert Mackay [mailto:r.mackay@mactutor.net] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaR9UtER96uW5L6juiyDUdYrmtblpY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Tuesday, April 03, 2012 1:13 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: Desirae Arredondo; Bruce Schulman (bruce@secure-a-lot.com <mailto:bruce@secure-a-lot.com>) Subject: Re: MacTutor, Inc. Invoice - Secure-A-Lot - #10558 Hi Sara, It is my understanding that we are doing work as a vender and not a contractor. It is also my understanding that we will incur no fees and will be paid the full value of our invoices for services rendered. I did log into the site and check the agreement and found the address details were incorrect and as such did not electronically sign the docs as they were presented. Please let me know when they are corrected and confirm that we are incurring no costs with MBO partners in relation to the work we are performing as a vender on this project. Thanks, Robert PresidentMacTutor, Inc.r.mackay@mactutor.net <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:r.mackay@mactutor.net?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaR9UtER96uW5L6juiyDUdYrmtblpY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>FileMaker 11, 10, 9, 8 Certified DeveloperFileMaker 11, 10 Authorized Trainerph 727 230-1439fax 727 230-1942

On Apr 3, 2012, at 12:25 PM, Sara Conde wrote: Hi Desire, The contract is so we can do business together. The bank information is so we can deposit funds in your business account once we have them from the client. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Desirae Arredondo [mailto:techadmin@mactutor.net] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaR9UtER96uW5L6juiyDUdYrmtblpY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Tuesday, April 03, 2012 12:24 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: r.mackay@mactutor.net <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:r.mackay@mactutor.net?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaR9UtER96uW5L6juiyDUdYrmtblpY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> MacKay Subject: Re: MacTutor, Inc. Invoice - Secure-A-Lot - #10558 Is this information for the purpose of setting up a bank wire? Thanks, Desirae On Apr 3, 2012, at 12:10 PM, Sara Conde wrote:
Hi Desirae, Thank you so much for these documents, you have almost completed our vender registration. Robert needs to log in, electronically sign our agreement and provide MacTurtor’s banking details. Robert – you will log in at www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaR9UtER96uW5L6juiyDUdYrmtblpY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> with the credentials you used to fill out the vender requirements. Thank you,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Desirae Arredondo [mailto:techadmin@mactutor.net] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaR9UtER96uW5L6juiyDUdYrmtblpY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Tuesday, April 03, 2012 11:10 AM To: Sara Conde Cc: bruce@vicidevelopment.com; r.mackay@mactutor.net <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:bruce@vicidevelopment.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaR9UtER96uW5L6juiyDUdYrmtblpY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Subject: Re: MacTutor, Inc. Invoice - Secure-A-Lot - #10558 Hi Sara, Please find attached our W9 and certificate of insurance that you need to complete processing for the submitted invoice. Please keep me posted as to when the payment will be sent. Are you able to set up a bank wire or is it check only? Thanks, Desirae On Apr 2, 2012, at 2:51 PM, Sara Conde wrote: Hi Desirae, Please have the certificate list MBO Partners, Inc. as holder with this address: 13454 Sunrise Valley Drive, Suite 300Herndon, VA 20171 You my use my personal information below for phone number, email etc. Thank you! ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: techadmin@mactutor.net [mailto:techadmin@mactutor.net] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaR9UtER96uW5L6juiyDUdYrmtblpY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Monday, April 02, 2012 2:37 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: bruce@vicidevelopment.com; r.mackay@mactutor.net <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:bruce@vicidevelopment.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaR9UtER96uW5L6juiyDUdYrmtblpY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Subject: RE: MacTutor, Inc. Invoice - Secure-A-Lot - #10558 Hi Sara, In order to get a certificate for you, I need to know what company name and address you need on certificate for the certificate holder. Will it be MBO Partners? What is the address? etc. I also need to know if there is any special wording you need on it. Once I have this info I can get the certificate emailed out to you :-) Thanks, Desirae On 30.03.2012 18:00, Sara Conde wrote:Hi Bruce, Thank you for entering in the expense, I went in and removed because in this case we will pay MacTurtor once we receive the funds form the City and have their W-9 and certificate of insurance. I just sent him an email about this and copied you on it. Thanks and have a great weekend.Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. -----Original Message-----From: Bruce Schulman ViciD [mailto:bruce@vicidevelopment.com] Sent: Friday, March 30, 2012 4:48 PMTo: Sara CondeCc: Desirae ArredondoSubject: Re: MacTutor, Inc. Invoice - Secure-A-Lot - #10558 Sara,Desirae works for Robert at Mactutor, Inc. They completed the vendor registration and also sent us an invoice. I put it in as an expense, but that might not be exactly how you want it. Since it needs to be in today before close of business to get paid next week, once Norwalk pays, please let me know if its in correctly or what needs to be done to get it entered correctly. Bruce On Fri, Mar 30, 2012 at 3:20 PM, Desirae Arredondo <techadmin@mactutor.net> wrote:Hi Bruce, Attached is the invoice to get started. I know you are trying to get this pushed today so I ccd Sara on this email as well so she can have as well if she needs it to pay.
